ED_Title: Comprehensive review of the whole question of peacekeeping operations in all their aspects
ED_DecisionText: At its 41stplenary meeting, on 10December 2020, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee) (A/75/413).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
